page.title: 19MENSTRIE PARISH CHURCH
page.content: Menstrie Parish Church plays an important part in village life, holding weekly services. In addition to this the church also runs many weekday clubs and activities. Special services are held at Xmas, Easter etc: {Searchlight:}A club for 15-18 year olds. Held in the Manse weekly. Involved in musical and dramatic work. They have during 1985 taken part International Youth Year. {BB,Guides and Brownies:}meetings are held in the Church Hall weekly. {Womans Guild:}Meet fortnightly during winter months. This year Menstrie W.G entertained Guilds from all over Scotland. {Sunday school/Bible class:}The junior sunday school is held in the church hall, while the senior and the bible- class are held in the community centre.
